member.name: T:Windows.Phone.Notification.Management.AccessoryNotificationType
member.summary: Represents the types of notifications that are raised on the phone. The IAccessoryNotificationTriggerDetails are available to the **IBackgroundTask.Run** method which is executed upon triggering by the AccessoryManager. Inside the IAccessoryNotificationTriggerDetails is an **INotification** object. The **BackgroundTask** developer needs to investigate this interface to determine what the specific notification type is.
